title: cli
description: Schema for defining custom themes for the Nyaa TUI.

bg.description: Background color. Can be 'Reset' or a color value.

fg.description: Foreground color. Can be 'Black', 'Red', 'Green', 'Yellow', 'Blue', 'Magenta', 'Cyan', 'White', 'LightBlack', 'LightRed', 'LightGreen', 'LightYellow', 'LightBlue', 'LightMagenta', 'LightCyan', 'LightWhite', or a hex color code.

border_color.description: Border color. Can be 'Black', 'Red', 'Green', 'Yellow', 'Blue', 'Magenta', 'Cyan', 'White', 'LightBlack', 'LightRed', 'LightGreen', 'LightYellow', 'LightBlue', 'LightMagenta', 'LightCyan', 'LightWhite', or a hex color code.

border_focused_color.description: Border color when the element is focused. Can be 'Black', 'Red', 'Green', 'Yellow', 'Blue', 'Magenta', 'Cyan', 'White', 'LightBlack', 'LightRed', 'LightGreen', 'LightYellow', 'LightBlue', 'LightMagenta', 'LightCyan', 'LightWhite', or a hex color code.

hl_bg.description: Highlight background color (e.g., for selected items).

solid_bg.description: Solid background color. Can be 'Black', 'Red', 'Green', 'Yellow', 'Blue', 'Magenta', 'Cyan', 'White', 'LightBlack', 'LightRed', 'LightGreen', 'LightYellow', 'LightBlue', 'LightMagenta', 'LightCyan', 'LightWhite', or a hex color code.

solid_fg.description: Solid foreground color. Can be 'Black', 'Red', 'Green', 'Yellow', 'Blue', 'Magenta', 'Cyan', 'White', 'LightBlack', 'LightRed', 'LightGreen', 'LightYellow', 'LightBlue', 'LightMagenta', 'LightCyan', 'LightWhite', or a hex color code.

success.description: Color for success messages. Can be 'Black', 'Red', 'Green', 'Yellow', 'Blue', 'Magenta', 'Cyan', 'White', 'LightBlack', 'LightRed', 'LightGreen', 'LightYellow', 'LightBlue', 'LightMagenta', 'LightCyan', 'LightWhite', or a hex color code.

error.description: Color for error messages. Can be 'Black', 'Red', 'Green', 'Yellow', 'Blue', 'Magenta', 'Cyan', 'White', 'LightBlack', 'LightRed', 'LightGreen', 'LightYellow', 'LightBlue', 'LightMagenta', 'LightCyan', 'LightWhite', or a hex color code.

info.description: Color for info messages. Can be 'Black', 'Red', 'Green', 'Yellow', 'Blue', 'Magenta', 'Cyan', 'White', 'LightBlack', 'LightRed', 'LightGreen', 'LightYellow', 'LightBlue', 'LightMagenta', 'LightCyan', 'LightWhite', or a hex color code.

warning.description: Color for warning messages. Can be 'Black', 'Red', 'Green', 'Yellow', 'Blue', 'Magenta', 'Cyan', 'White', 'LightBlack', 'LightRed', 'LightGreen', 'LightYellow', 'LightBlue', 'LightMagenta', 'LightCyan', 'LightWhite', or a hex color code.
